title: Big Banks Report Earnings Amid Uncertain Economy
itunes:title: Big Banks Report Earnings Amid Uncertain Economy
description:
Bloomberg Intelligence Senior Global Banks Analyst Alison Williams breaks down earnings from Citi and Wells Fargo. Bloomberg Opinion Columnist Justin Fox explains why inflation is even worse if you measure it properly. Bloomberg Businessweek Editor Joel Weber and Bloomberg News Saudi Arabia Correspondent Vivian Nereim share the details of Vivian's Businessweek Magazine story MBS’s $500 Billion Desert Dream Just Keeps Getting Weirder. Steve Russell, Portfolio Manager at Emerald Advisers, discusses investing in cryptocurrency technology.  
 Hosts: Carol Massar and Tim Stenovec. Producer: Paul Brennan. 

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
